sentences.en: But Kimberly-Clark, which touts its green credentials on its website, rejects the idea that it is pushing destructive products on an unwitting American public.
sentences.cn: 但是金佰利，虽在其网站上宣称有环保证明，但拒绝承认它正在向不知情的美国公众推销其破坏环境的产品。

sentences.en: EXMP : he kept the truth from their unwitting friends.
sentences.cn: 他对不知情的朋友隐瞒真相.

sentences.en: He became an unwitting accomplice in the crime.
sentences.cn: 他糊里糊涂地成了犯罪的帮凶。

sentences.en: Introduce:An inflexible old lady the saving lifetime - , below the old mattess that million euro hid her, can be this mattess however by unwitting children people disrelish too old old, threw.
sentences.cn: 简介：一个古板的老太太把一生的积蓄-—一百万欧元都藏到了她的旧床垫下面，可是这个床垫却被不知情的子女们嫌太老旧，扔了。

sentences.en: Is he the architect of the evil that has befallen the town, or simply an unwitting pawn?
sentences.cn: 他到底是把恶魔引到镇上的罪魁祸首，还是仅仅是一个毫不知情的卒子？

sentences.en: It had been an unwitting blunder on Blair's part.
sentences.cn: 它曾是布莱尔的无心之失。

sentences.en: It is this unwitting interpretation of interpretation that interests de Man.
sentences.cn: 正是这个未被意识到的“阐释的阐释”吸引了德曼.

sentences.en: More and more, health is the unwitting victim of policies made in the international systems that tie countries, economies, commerce, and trade together.
sentences.cn: 在越来越多的情况中，卫生工作不知不觉地成为把国家、经济、商业和贸易联系在一起的国际系统中所制定政策的受害者。

sentences.en: She was the unwitting tool of the swindlers.
sentences.cn: 她不知不觉地被这些诈骗犯所利用,成了他们的工具.

sentences.en: She was unwitting tool of the swindlers.
sentences.cn: 她不知道自己是骗子的道具.

sentences.en: Situations are staged and the reactions of unwitting passers - by are filmed.
sentences.cn: 设定多种情境后,并不知情的 过路人 的反应会被拍摄下来.

sentences.en: The focal point of MKULTRA was the use of humans as unwitting subjects [ without their knowledge ].
sentences.cn: MKULTRA的焦点是利用不知情的人类 [ 在他们不知情的情况下 ].

sentences.en: We were unwitting collaborators in his plan.
sentences.cn: 我们无意中成为他的计划的协作者。

sentences.en: We're unwitting victims of the system.
sentences.cn: 我们都是该系统的不知情的受害者。

words.tran_cn: 不知不觉地；不知情地；不经意地
不知情的；不知不觉的，无意的

trans.tran_cn: 不知道的，未觉察的，无意的
trans.tran_en: If you describe a person or their actions as unwitting, you mean that the person does something or is involved in something without realizing it

trans.tran_cn: 使精神错乱；使丧失智能（unwit的ing形式）
使精神错乱(unwit的ing形式)，使丧失智能
